resources.string: Daleel Al Hurra uses precise location to show nearby car dealers, calculate accurate distances, and provide turn-by-turn directions via Google Maps integration.
Daleel Al Hurra uses approximate location to find car dealers in your general area and provide location-based car deal recommendations.
Daleel Al Hurra uses background location to send you real-time notifications about nearby car deals and dealer promotions when you\'re on the move.
Google Maps is integrated into Daleel Al Hurra to provide interactive maps, directions to car dealers, and location-based search functionality to help you find the best car deals in your area.
